title: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney Trilogy
tags: Adventure,Visual Novel,Detective,Anime,Investigation,Mystery,Singleplayer,Crime,3D,Story Rich,Choose Your Own Adventure,Text-Based,Great Soundtrack,Point & Click
description: Join rookie attorney Apollo Justice and his mentor, the legendary Phoenix Wright, in this collection of 3 games! This title features 16 episodes (including previously DLC-only episodes) and supports English, French, German, Japanese Korean, and Traditional and Simplified Chinese.
